column4: Tourism;Phnom Penh: The Ministry of Health issued a press release on the morning of October 8
column6: confirming the discovery of a new positive case of COVID19 .------It states that the 26-year-old Indonesian man was staying at a hotel in Sihanoukville. He arrived in Cambodia on October 6
column7: 2020 with a positive test result provided by the Institut Pasteur du Cambodge
column8: Phnom Penh. The patient is currently being treated at the Khmer-Soviet Friendship Hospital.------The total number of passengers on the same flight (*no details yet) was 113 (23 females)
column9: of which 26 were Indonesian men. A total of 112 passengers with negative Kovid-19 test results were screened for two days at 49 Borei High Schools
column11: 62 at Phnom Penh and one at the Singapore Embassy.------By October 08
column13: Cambodia has detected a total of 281 cases
